fields.name: Air Support (Charge 20%):
fields.value: Grant your target(s) redirection and roleblock immunity.

fields.name: Spotlight (Charge 40%):
fields.value: Roleblock your target and learn who they would have visited.

fields.name: Evacuate (Charge 80%):
fields.value: All visits to your target will silently fail. This ability may not self-target.

fields.name: Eye in the Sky (Passive):
fields.value: Learn a random number of visits (e.g. "Player1 -> Player2"), based on your score, each night you use any other ability.

fields.name: No Traffic (Passive):
fields.value: You may use multiple abilities each night, provided you have ammo.

fields.name: Radio (Passive):
fields.value: Access a factional chat with other Police-subaligned players.

fields.name: Bureaucratic Oversight (Passive):
fields.value: You must spawn with a Chief of Police (Post 32).
